faqs.question: WordPress or React? Which one is better for me?
faqs.answer: If you need to update content often and manage the site yourself, WordPress is perfect. If you need more dynamic logic or custom flows, React/Next.js is the better fit. We decide together.

faqs.question: Will I be able to edit things on my own?
faqs.answer: Yes. You’ll be able to change text, images, and sections. I also include a short walkthrough so you don't depend on me.

faqs.question: Will the site be fast?
faqs.answer: Yes. I configure caching, compression, image optimization, and clean structure from day one. No bloated templates.

faqs.question: What do I need to get started?
faqs.answer: A domain and a hosting service. If you don’t have them, I’ll help you choose a good option without overspending.

items.text: Designed specifically for your workflow. No templates, no forcing processes.

faqs.question: Can this replace spreadsheets or manual work?
faqs.answer: Yes. If you have repetitive tasks or tracking in Excel, a custom app automates it and reduces mistakes.

faqs.question: Do I need to know anything technical?
faqs.answer: No. We design it together to be simple to use. I handle the technical part.

faqs.question: Can I add new features later?
faqs.answer: Yes. It’s designed to evolve without breaking.

faqs.question: How do I know if my brand needs improvement?

faqs.question: Which tools do you use?

portfolio.work.title: Description

portfolio.works.title: Cleanmax Website
portfolio.works.content: The goal was to build a modern, high-performance website aligned with Cleanmax’s brand identity. Developed in WordPress using ACF for full content flexibility and styled with Bootstrap to match corporate colors and typography. Images and assets were optimized to achieve excellent scores on Google PageSpeed Insights. The result is a professional, fast, and fully responsive website that reflects Cleanmax’s values: maximum cleanliness and maximum efficiency.

portfolio.works.title: Personal Portfolio - Martin Vera
portfolio.works.goal: Showcase my work as a developer and offer a fast, minimal experience
portfolio.works.text: Personal portfolio built with React and Mantine, focused on performance, clean design, and maintainability.
portfolio.works.content: This site was created to centralize my projects and present my work as a web developer in a clear and professional way. Built with React and Mantine UI, it features a minimalist design, smooth animations, and a modular architecture that supports scalability. Vite is used as the bundler to achieve lightning-fast load times and great performance. It also includes multilingual support and Google Analytics integration to monitor user interaction. The result is a fast, modern, and functional site that reflects my development style: simple, efficient, and polished.

contact.faqs.question: How soon will you reply?
contact.faqs.answer: Usually within 24 hours. If I'm in the middle of a delivery, it may take a bit longer, but I always respond.

contact.faqs.question: Do we need a video call first?
contact.faqs.answer: Not always. If your message explains the project clearly, we can start by email. A call is useful once we have details to align.

contact.faqs.question: Can you work with my existing developer or team?
contact.faqs.answer: Yes. I collaborate with designers, devs, PMs, and QA teams often. Clear communication is the key.

contact.faqs.question: Do you work with international clients?
contact.faqs.answer: Yes. I work with clients in the US, LATAM, and Europe. Payments and communication are not an issue.

contact.faqs.question: What information should I include in the message?
contact.faqs.answer: Tell me what you need, any links, examples, deadlines, and what success looks like to you. The clearer the initial message, the faster we move.
